scripts.build:all: npm run build:wordpress && npm run build web
scripts.run:web: docker run -v $(pwd)/web:/var/www/html --link viki-bell-website-mysql:viki-bell-website-mysql -p 80:80 -d --env-file .env --name viki-bell-website-web viki-bell-website-web && npm run install:composer
scripts.remove:wordpress: docker stop viki-bell-website-wordpress && docker rm viki-bell-website-wordpress
scripts.remove:web: docker stop viki-bell-website-web && docker rm viki-bell-website-web
scripts.remove:mysql: docker stop viki-bell-website-mysql && docker rm viki-bell-website-mysql
scripts.remove:phpmyadmin: docker stop viki-bell-website-phpmyadmin && docker rm viki-bell-website-phpmyadmin
scripts.remove:all: npm run remove:wordpress && npm run remove:mysql && npm run remove:web
scripts.run:all: npm run run:mysql && npm run run:wordpress
scripts.install:composer: docker exec viki-bell-website-web sh -c 'exec composer install --no-interaction'
scripts.run:all: npm run run:mysqlWithData && npm run run:web && npm run run:wordpress
scripts.restart: npm run remove:all && npm run run:all
scripts.reset: npm run remove:all && npm run remove:volumes && npm run build:all && npm run run:all
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm run run:all
